data.name: Elemental Battlefields
data.detailed_description:
Fight solo or team up with friends in this action-packed magic fighting game! To earn diamonds and shards, use your magic and level up! You can also find them around the map in Drop Zones and buy them in the in-game shop. Spend them on learning any new element you choose!

STARTER ELEMENTS:

FIRE
Use your firey power to harness the power of fire. As a fire specialist, you can shoot fireballs that you can ride, or instead light yourself on fire for buffs!
WATER
Use your water mastery to harness the power of water. As a water specialist, you can create a ridable puddle, or you can create a water dragon dealing AOE damage!
GRASS
Use your grass skill to harness the power of grass. As a grass specialist, you can shoot thorns that heal you, or create a plant-powered tornado!

VAST OPEN WORLD

Participate in the all-new elemental combat simulator, discover hidden areas of the arena and earn limited-time rewards such as founder spells!

CREATIVE COMBAT

Using the Unreal Engine, we have created completely new element fighting mechanics that you can guide spells with your cursor!

2-20 PLAYER GAMEPLAY

Fight solo or team up with your friends, host games, and create private battles for rewards!

Join the community discord to receive more frequent updates for the game (link below)

Controls PC: Double-tap WASD to do flips, Ctrl/Cmd to sprint, Q to punch, R to block.

https://discord.gg/7x5AkHeJpV

data.short_description: Fight solo or team up with friends in this action-packed magic fighting game! To earn diamonds and shards, use your magic and level up! You can also find them around the map in Drop Zones and buy them in the in-game shop. Spend them on learning any new element you choose!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2,00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I5-4440 3,10 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: If you can run other games on Steam, it's probably OK
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
